entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Ronna, Ronna, Ronna.  Did you forget why the unemployment rate got so high?  It’s unfortunate for Donald they didn’t get even worse.  Then he’d have a bigger increase to “celebrate”.  It is really the upside down world at the White House these days.  #coronavirus  #ApocalypseNow
